Radish Boy: Thanks to Radish Boy, his friends escaped. Together, they returned to the village as fast as they could.
After a long journey, Radish Boy and his friends made it back safely back to their waiting families.
The village elder fumed at Radish Boy for putting himself in danger, but forgave him for saving his friends.
Radish Boy became the village hero. A statue of him was built to commemorate this... Except...
